body_html: I can rephrase the question. Do you think the tensorflow computational graphs are good enough to manage resource efficiently? My current understanding is that it is not. I put this question to get second opinion from the tensorflow community. May be someone has strong argument/proof of work to negate my understanding.

body: I can rephrase the question. Do you think the tensorflow computational graphs are good enough to manage  resource efficiently? My current understanding is that it is not. I put this question to get second opinion from the tensorflow community. May be someone has strong argument/proof of work to negate my understanding.
